thread.title: Ground News - Labour leaders hail Pakistan ratifying Hong Kong shipbreaking convention
thread.title_full: Ground News - Labour leaders hail Pakistan ratifying Hong Kong shipbreaking convention

author: The News
title: Ground News - Labour leaders hail Pakistan ratifying Hong Kong shipbreaking convention
text:
Summary by The News Labour leaders and rights activists on Saturday expressed satisfaction at Pakistan ratifying of the Hong Kong convention for shipbreaking, saying that it will not only bring a change in the lives of shipbreaking workers but also ensure a boom in the Pakistani economy by spurring the shipbreaking...
